generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface extending down the street, flanked by parked cars on both sides, is clearly a road.
- building: Multiple multi-story residential buildings line both sides of the street, with visible windows, doors, and architectural details.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are visible along the sidewalks and between buildings.
- sky: A gray, overcast sky is visible above the buildings and trees.
- car: Numerous cars are parked along both sides of the street, including a green car in the foreground on the left and a silver convertible on the right.
- traffic sign: A circular "30" speed limit sign is visible on the right side of the street.
- pole: A vertical pole supporting the traffic sign is visible on the right side of the street.
